::Lord Elder::
=A0
Elder(via comm): Continue to concentrait fire on the lea=
p Minions. The Sweeps will keep pounding us but it is the smartest strategy=
. We also need to help supply power to the Ark shields. Find a way to trans=
fer any power from the shuttle.
=A0
He continues to fire on the enemies.
=
=A0
::Lord Jhiaxus::
=A0
As Tumult pulls away Jhiaxus targets him with miss=
iles and lets two fly.
=A0
::Scorponok::
=A0
Scorponok he is a sitting duck=
 and he is hit with several blasts. Some of his gun batteres are destroyed.=
 He rolls trying to avoid further strikes. When his back is facing up he sw=
ings his tail at any Minions that might be close enough.
=A0
::Dark Rodimus=
::
=A0
As Rodimus passes Cyclonus the palm blasts hit him in the side. They=
 cause some good damage but Rodimus refuses to let out any sign of pain. He=
 lands on his feet just past Cyclonus and immedietly drops low and kicks ou=
t, trying to sweep Cyclonus.

onus@...> wrote:

pose to be with us, get your aft plates over here!"

The channel closed abr=
uptly as the sounds of weapons fire could be

w are attacking the ark directly)

------------ --------- --------- -------=

> Elder and Grimlock begin fireing on said Minion=
s. The shuttle and 
Ark weapons do the same.

 Maixmals are concentraiting their fire 
and turns about, opening laser 
> =
fire on the same targets.

As normal Scourge is indistinguishable from othe=
r sweeps and so is 
ignored by the cannon fire, but the other minion in the=
 air is not as 
fortunate as multiple guns opened up on Tumult! While he is=
 highly 
agile and very well armored, several shots hit him, causing him to=
 
flip through the air like so much scrap! He is unable to return fire 
as =
he attempts to move away!

However as soon as the Maximals and Autobots sto=
p focusing on the 
sweeps they on the other hand open fire on the shields t=
hat legacy is 
holding in place, causing it to flicker and weaken visibly. =
It is 
clear that without the shuttle or Ark to augment his own weapons the=
 
sweeps will quickly deplete his power reserves. 

------------ --------- =
--------- --------- --------- --------- -

As Scorponok unleashed a full we=
apon batteries onslaught, several 
sweeps are caught in the fire and explod=
e, spewing debris on the 
ground. However the other six Sweeps swing around=
 and open fire on 
the hopefully more stationary and vulnerable Scorponok!
=

------------ --------- --------- --------- --------- --------- -

Decibel =
laughed as the sweeps moved in over Predicons, raining 
destruction down on=
 them. She was in the upper skies, allowing the 
sweeps to absorb the openi=
ng salvo of weapons as she targets Hydras' 
shuttle again with more sonic m=
issiles! The sweeps on the other hand 
take the brunt of the attacks, a few=
 exploding like miniature 
fireballs!

------------ --------- --------- ---=
------ --------- --------- -

> As Cyc's laser blasts come at him, Rodimus =
transforms to bot mode, 
leaping over the lasers.
> He is close to Cyclonus=
, coming at him in a flying kick position.

Cyclonus watched the nimble Aut=
obot leap at him, his face calm almost 
speculative as he observes. "Intere=
sting . . . " He said as he 
stepped to one side of the kick as he at the s=
ame time charged his 
palm blasters and opened fire on Rodimus as he passed=
 by him, " . . . 
but ultimately useless."

Preston
(Da'minion)

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Lord Elder::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder(via comm): Continue to concentrait fire on the leap Minions. The Sweeps will keep pounding us but it is the smartest strategy. We also need to help supply power to the Ark shields. Find a way to transfer any power from the shuttle.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>He continues to fire on the enemies.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Lord Jhiaxus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>As Tumult pulls away Jhiaxus targets him with missiles and lets two fly.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Scorponok::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Scorponok he is a sitting duck and he is hit with several blasts. Some of his gun batteres are destroyed. He rolls trying to avoid further strikes. When his back is facing up he swings his tail at any Minions that might be close enough.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Dark Rodimus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>As Rodimus passes Cyclonus the palm blasts hit him in the side. They cause some good damage but Rodimus refuses to let out any sign of pain. He lands on his feet just past Cyclonus and immedietly drops low and kicks out, trying to sweep Cyclonus.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Fri, 7/18/08, supercyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
